content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2022 Wimbledon Packages

Allow us to design a personalized travel experience for you to the most famous tennis event in the world. Our 2022 Wimbledon travel packages include first class hotels in London, debenture tickets, access to exclusive in-stadium restaurants and bars, a full English breakfast daily, and more. Wimbledon is one of those bucket list events that needs to be experienced in person to be fully appreciated and we’d love to help you get there.

We’ll put you Centre Court for the fast-paced tennis action. From the Royal Family to the rich strawberries and cream to the crisp white uniforms of the players, this prestigious tournament is steeped in history and tradition. Take advantage of our experience and expertise so you can enjoy an authentic British experience to Wimbledon and London. Complete 2022 Wimbledon Getaway packages (2-night/1-session) available from $3,645 per person based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 Wimbledon Championships

For tennis fans, summer begins when Wimbledon does. Every year, the top players in the sport gather in London for the oldest and most prestigious tennis tournament in the world. This famous contest has taken place at London’s All England Lawn Tennis Club since 1877. Played on the club’s iconic grass courts, it is one of tennis’ four grand slam tournaments, along with the Australian Open, French Open, and U.S. Open.
